content: get ready to create a cozy and stylish leaping crochet baby hoodie with this intermediate-level pattern perfect for both boys and girls this seamless top-down design features a hood and front fastening for easy dressing worked in the round with stripes/colorwork this pattern offers a fun and engaging project for crocheters of all skill levels **unique features-** seamless construction for a polished finish hooded design adds warmth and charm front fastening for easy dressing written pattern with detailed instructions worked in the round for a continuous look **materials needed-** hook 6mm us size 10 0 yarn red heart soft https //tidd ly/4l6y8yy heathers & solids aran weight 460-800 yards
